EmailTemplate.name: DaDaDocs Instructions Case 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Installation Instructions - DaDaDocs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!User.FirstName},
Thank you for successfully installing the DaDaDocs Enterprise Package in your Salesforce Organization.
In order to configure the application, please follow our instructions guide (https://www.pdffiller.com/en/salesforce/install). Please feel free to contact us with any configuration, product functionality or pricing questions.
We would be happy to offer you a quick demo of the product.
Thank you, DaDaDocs Team Phone: 617-680-7973 Email: dadadocs-support@pdffiller.com
1371 Beacon st, suite 301, Brookline, MA 02446
